gpt_critique.critique: Some SDG scores undervalue educational impact and urban planning relevance; propose recalibrations for SDG4, SDG8, SDG11, SDG15, and SDG17.

Quality Education.reason: Course objectives develop research, analysis, and scholarly communication skills, aligning with SDG4 targets.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Course builds leadership, teamwork, and research/publication capability, supporting productive employment.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: Comprehensive GIS outputs (maps, DEM/DSM, 3D) and object extraction support urban planning.

Life on Land.reason: DSM/DEM generation and topographic extraction aid land management.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: Leadership, teamwork, publications, international conference participation foster partnerships.
